betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oSolar arrays are solar panel multiblocks that can be assembled using a variety of solar cell combinations.

The higher the tier of the controller, and the higher the tier of the cells, the better.

For Tier 6:
Litherite: 332254 RF/t
Erodium: 442949 RF/t
Kyronite: 664508 RF/t
Pladium: 885898 RF/t
Ionite: 1329016 RF/t
Aethium: 1771965 RF/t

§fI REALLY get it!
